item.title: Transport v2.0.6.37
item.description:
Product: Transport v2.0.6.37
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 03 Nov 2025 16:21:00 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

[Transport]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

[Transport Server]
Server used for scripting and performing asynchronous transport measurments.


Release Notes: [2.0.6]
- Issue #144 add checks for existing paths
item.dc:creator: Levylab

Release Notes: [3.10.2]
#118 #122 Improvements to data backup for invalid SQL or if database is unreachable
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v3.0.0.42
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v3.0.0.42
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 30 Oct 2025 17:25:19 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [3.0.0]
This release fixes a long-standing issue in which the demodulated phase a strong function of both the reference frequency and sampling frequency. Details are discussed in Issue #122

#### Other features and bug fixes
#121 Work is distributed among child classes (DAQ, DSP, Signal Generator)
#122 Fix phase vs frequency
#123 Fix issue in which AO settings were not recalled properly from disk
#124 DAQ would stop when changing the reference frequency
#125 Improve recall of plot visibility
#126 Improve AO and Ref waveform graph
#127 Bug fix related to phase resetting at random
#128 Re-enable offset measurement
#130 Re-arrange right tab graphs and indicators
#131 Rename right tabs
#132 Fix DAQmx window behavior
#133 Add sawtooth waveform and duty cycle control for square waveform
#134 Add better error handling if DAQmx stops on error: DAQ process will try to automatically restart DAQmx
#135 Fix lockin channel labels when there are multiple reference channels

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
